ygData.subject: Re: Role-playing element in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: It s just the power gamer/munchkin in all of us that make us choose like crazy
ygData.messageBody:
It's just the power gamer/munchkin in all of us that make us choose like crazy

Entreri wrote:

> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> To tell ya guys the truth,I think choosing your personal FAV class is more
> important,what u feel is good or else as I believe all classes have their
> drawbacks so choose what u think is GOOD not the fact thats its good..hehe
>
> Well,thats what I did..heh
>
> Entreri
>
> Email: drizzt@...
> ICQ UIN: 2326860
> Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
> http://www.sg-gaming.net
> Your Single Source of Everything Gaming
>
> .plan at
> http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 1:48 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >I've analysed the erudite, dark elf and gnome when I try to make my 2nd
> >wiz. No doubt erudite and dark elf "seem' to have better vital stats for a
> >wiz, but if you look at an overall view, a gnome seems to work out better -
> >due to the high dex and high agi, which I top them up with 5 stats each to
> >make them 90. Having high dex, my casting rarely get disturbed, and with
> >high agi, many times I managed to kill my opponents b4 they killed me when
> >it's a fair fight coz I can avoid their attack and blast them back. The
> >impt stats for wiz is INT and STA, which is where I spend all my 30 stats
> >points when I create my 1st high elf wiz in Innoruuk. H/w, after reading
> >so many player guides in the net, I realised we all missed a very impt
> >point - ie to built AGI instead of STA. Why? Becoz at high lvl, compare
> >putting 5 points in STA and AGI, will u wanna get hit by a monster that
> >delivery a 100 HP dam with the additional 25HP gain due to the 5 STA
> >points, or to stand a higher chance to totally avoid the 100 HP dam? ;)
> >
> >I think EQVault, EQSS, EQlore, EQlizer, EQGuide etc all have very
> >interesting and informative articles on creating chars which worth reading
> >b4 making a new char ;)
> >
> >Always remember - the game itself has the default vital stats for each
> >class, but we have to consider our playing style as well. Simply building
> >up based on the vital status may hinder ya survival in EQ :)
> >
> >Mondain (Gnome Wiz)
> >
> >p/s: OK buddy Leshrec, I will join u in making an evil char to wipe out the
> >painskin pigs, whahahahahaah! I leave you guys to guess what I'm creating
> >tonight....maybe a surprise for all when I reach high lvl, heh.
> >
> >On Monday, June 14, 1999 12:30 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> >[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> >> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >>
> >> i dont mind being a bad guy as long as i can find company... but i think
> >fer
> >> a start... its better to improve ya relationship with other races... i
> >dont
> >> think i want the entire town KOS whenever... wherever i visit... btw...
> >if
> >> they keep coming up to u... i.e., KOS... then how can u ever improve ya
> >> faction? think thats gonna be a hard task.... although the gnome has
> >better
> >> stats... than the dark elf... but i think... in terms of stats critical
> >to
> >> Necro... Dark Elf is slightly better...in fact... i think comparable to
> >> Erudite... as i tried to create both on paper... n Dark Elf got the
> >> advantage of Hide n Ultravision... :) maybe i need more research as
> >regards
> >> to Erudite n Dark Elf...
> >>
> >> till then...
> >> Fred
> >> ----- Original Message -----
> >> From: Leshrec <leshrec@...>
> >> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 12:21 PM
> >> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ
> >>
> >>
> >> > From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
> >> >
> >> > Aye i'm intending to improve my faction not for the sake of good, but
> >> rather
> >> > to fool the pale skinned beings, whom many of you call humans into
> >> believing
> >> > I am fighting for their cause. However, I am loyal only to Innoruuk
> >> himself
> >> > and for that, I say HAIL INNORUUK. Seeing the humans die shall always
> >be
> >> my
> >> > joy, however i always welcome another ally in Evil.----->Mondain )
> >> > ooc Although the gnomish necro has the best stats, I chose dark elf
> >after
> >> > seeing a fully equipped Tier'dal necro wearing full Gossmer armor, not
> >> sure
> >> > of the spelling who looked really nice . I saw many gnomish warriors
> >wear
> >> > armor and they look kinda stumpy hehe.
> >> > btw, the human guards in commons won't attack, neither do the guards in
> >> > freeport, they are evil. I got a dubious con on most of them, but those
> >> with
> >> > SIR, u better watch out. They are the self proclaimed paladins and are
> >> fools
> >> > imho. Innkeepers in commons are KOS to us tho, so if u plan on coming
> >> > commons, don't go near them. They are better martial arts expert than
> >the
> >> > guards.
> >> > Any yes, if possible i would like to wipe out a goody town when i'm
> >very
> >> > high level. imagine seeing the bodies of those pale skin beings lying
> >on
> >> the
> >> > floor in a bloody heap. Yummy )
> >> > -----Original Message-----
> >> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> > To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> > Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 11:05 AM
> >> > Subject: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> > >
> >> > >Anyone read the recent EQ review in CGW June issue?
> >> > >
> >> > >It pointed out that EQ is more of a hack and slash RPG while UO has
> >more
> >> > >stuffs other than hack & slash. Somehow I agree coz seem like I've
> >> > >nothing much to do other than blasting monsters in EQ, hehe. Dunno
> >how
> >> > >long can this 'blasting' will last me in EQ ;)
> >> > >
> >> > >Btw, I'm having a hard time in Steamfont Mountain after my wiz achieve
> >> lvl
> >> > >5 via soloing, AGAIN. As in Felwithe, I'm having a hard time finding
> >a
> >> > >good team to gain XP to higher lvl. 90% of the team I mixed so far sux
> >-
> >> > >some members even disband and flee when a train of monsters killed our
> >> > >tanks and rushed towards the casters, LOL. (Oh remember the name
> >David,
> >> > >this guy looted everything in group hunting and said "who loot also
> >> nimnd",
> >> > >hehe, and he is always the first one who disband and flee when danger
> >> arise
> >> > >- his name disappear in group list not becoz he LD but I personally
> >see
> >> him
> >> > >running off, hehe).
> >> > >
> >> > >Anyone make a gnomish char? Need a buddy badly there ;) If not, I
> >will
> >> > >create a TSK or TSH (someone said we need more cleric/shaman chars in
> >> > >Prexus guild?) and solo all the way - ie make the darkest evil char.
> >> Kinda
> >> > >sian finding pple to team with. Been a lawful good char in UO, maybe
> >it
> >> 's
> >> > >time to make a chaotic evil one in EQ, wahahahaha!
> >> > >
> >> > >Btw, Leshrec, need to check with u. Regarding ya DEN, do u intend to
> >> > >role-play evil or intend to "turn over a new leave" (ie improve ya
> >> faction
> >> > >with other races)? Anyone ever think of building a high lvl EVIL char
> >> and
> >> > >wipe off an npc town? hehehe.
> >> > >
> >> > >Mondain
> >> > >
> >> > >
